body.header: What will I learn in this unit?
body.section: The Speaking Test Part 2: Dealing with the topic You will read advice for candidates in Part 2 of the speaking test, including a review of how to behave in the speaking test. You will watch a candidate dealing with the Part 2 topic and the questions that followed, and will think about what advice you would give the candidate. You will then watch two more candidates deal with the same topic. You will think about the follow-up question and giving reasons for your answer. Finally, you will study the link between Part 2 and Part 3 of the speaking test. You will watch three candidates talking about the news.
